name: Vectra XDR Splunk SOAR
description: Vectra AI is the leader in AI-driven threat detection and response for hybrid and multi-cloud enterprises. Organizations worldwide rely on Vectra to stay ahead of modern cyber-attacks. The Vectra AI App enables the security operations team to consume the industry's richest threat signals spanning public cloud, SaaS, identity and data center networks and take appropriate action whether automated, semi-automated, or manual, using Splunk SOAR

entity_tags.description: Filter entities with given tags (Comma-separated) (On Poll)

urgency_score_low_threshold.description: Set container severity 'low' if entity has equal or less urgency score

urgency_score_medium_threshold.description: Set container severity 'medium' if entity has equal or less urgency score

on_poll_start_time.description: Start time for manual polling and first run of schedule polling (Any valid ISO date and time format string)

manual_max_allowed_container.description: Max entities to ingest for manual polling

schedule_max_allowed_container.description: Max entities to ingest for schedule polling

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity using supplied configuration

example_values: A credential was observed enumerating aws Organization details.
The detection has been successfully fetched

actions.description: Get all the details of an entity

example_values: The entity has been successfully fetched

outcome.description: Outcome title like Benign True Positive, Malicious True Positive, False Positive(Custom outcome is allowed)

example_values: The tags has been added successfully
The tags has been removed successfully

note.description: Note which needs to be added in entity

actions.description: Update the note of an entity

note.description: A string containing a new note that will be updated in the specified entity

actions.description: Remove the note from an entity
List all active detections present in an entity

example_values: This host was seen making an outbound connection on a destination port that is rare for the environment and lasted longer than 5 minutes.

actions.description: Ingest entities from Vectra using Vectra API
